title: WWE legend The Undertaker stuns fans as he is spotted in Nandos

The Undertaker enjoyed a ‘cheeky’ Nandos during his recent trip to the UK.

The legendary WWE superstar was spotted sitting on a table alone at the popular chicken eatery.

Taker - real name Mark Calaway - was in Scotland to appear at a Comic Con event in Glasgow, where fans were charged £500 for a special meet and greet.

And the 54-year-old icon left some fans speechless after he was seen waiting for a Piri-Piri special.

One fan wrote on Twitter : “Imagine sitting in Nandos and you see The Undertaker eating his era mild wrap.”

Another wrote: “Who knew The Undertaker likes a cheeky Nandos”.

(Image: xxxxxxxx/Twitter)

WWE newcomer Tyson Fury reportedly treated 52 people to a Nandos meal last year.

The lineal world heavyweight boxing champion will fight Braun Strowman at Crown Jewel later this month.

But in 2018 he was reported to have spent over £700 in a Manchester restaurant, treating fans to a free meal after taking part in an open training workout ahead of his comeback win over Sefer Seferi.

Taker, meanwhile, is likely to return to the WWE ring for the October 31 pay-per-view extravaganza in Saudi Arabia.

In a local promotion, the ‘Deadman’ teased an appearance at the show.

(Image: © WWE)

“Welcome to the Riyadh season,” he says in the video.

“Our signature event at Crown Jewel will be a spectacle of historic proportions, bringing together WWE superstars from both past… and present.”

Taker was due to appear on the Fox premiere of Smackdown earlier this month but surprisingly did not feature alongside a host of other legends, including Goldberg and Hulk Hogan.

(Image: © WWE)

He did upload a throwback picture on Instagram , celebrating “20 years of Smackdown”.

When asked why he did not appear on air, the ‘Phenom’ bluntly replied: “I was told I won’t be needed.”

An opponent has not yet been announced for The Undertaker at Crown Jewel but there is speculation he could feature somewhere on the card - potentially in the Seth Rollins vs Bray Wyatt, WWE Universal title match.
description: The Undertaker was in Scotland to appear at a Comic Con event in Glasgow when he decided to head for some chicken
